eidolonunchained.codex.entry.text_exampl: This is a simple text example showing how to create codex entries.
Text entries are the simplest type of codex content. They display formatted text to the reader.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.recipe_exam: Recipe pages automatically display crafting grids and ingredients.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.entity_exam: This example demonstrates how to show entity information.
